Name: Multicoloured straw basket
Description: This straw basket, which comes from the art trade of Cairo, was made according to the wrapping technique. A small bundle of straw was twisted and at the same time rolled into spirals,  and then held by a process which consists of attaching a part of each turn to the next turn. The piece, which dates from the Middle Kingdom, is particularly distinguished by wrapping work realised in differents colours.
